abilities.name: Fill the Chalice
abilities.description: The blood of slain warriors is siphoned into this fell manifestation.
abilities.effect: Each time an enemy model is slain within 6" of this Manifestation, give this Manifestation 1 gore token (to a maximum of 6).

abilities.name: Overflowing Gore
abilities.description: When the gore inside the chalice overflows, the Flesh-eaters upon whom it slops are filled with murderous vigour.
abilities.effect: If this Manifestation has 6 gore tokens, pick up to 3 friendly Flesh-eater Courts units wholly within 12" of this Manifestation to be the targets. Heal (D3) each target. Then, reset this Manifestation's gore tokens to 0.
